question: Ashutosh Aman, which is in news recently, is associated with which sports?
explanation: Bihar left-arm spinner Ashutosh Aman broke the 44-year old record of most wickets in a single Ranji Trophy season by finishing the 2018-19 tournament with 68 wickets.  He break the previous record of 64 dismissals set by former India captain Bishan Singh Bedi in the 1974â€“75 tournament. Aman now holds the record for most wickets taken in a Ranji Trophy season by any bowler. He is employed with the Indian Air Force (IAR) and hails from Bihar\'s Gaya.
